scripts.play: rimraf dist && ls -1 ./src/scene/* | xargs -i{} npx wtc {} ./src/js/ && npx webpack serve --open --mode development
scripts.dev: rimraf dist && ls -1 ./src/scene/* | xargs -i{} npx wtc {} ./src/js/ && npx webpack serve --mode development
scripts.build: rimraf dist && ls -1 ./src/scene/* | xargs -i{} npx wtc {} ./src/js/ && webpack --mode production && rm -rf ./src/js/
